amendment.description: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to clarify that territories and Indian tribes are eligible to receive grants for confronting the use of methamphetamine.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3208 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3208 proposed by Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S12842-12844; text: CR S12843) To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to clarify that territories and Indian tribes are eligible to receive grants for confronting the use of methamphetamine.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3208 proposed by Senator Bingaman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3208 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
